org.grails.datastore.gorm.neo4j
[Groovy] Class Neo4jOpenSessionInViewInterceptor

java.lang.Object
  org.grails.datastore.mapping.web.support.OpenSessionInViewInterceptor
      org.grails.datastore.gorm.neo4j.Neo4jOpenSessionInViewInterceptor

class Neo4jOpenSessionInViewInterceptor
extends org.grails.datastore.mapping.web.support.OpenSessionInViewInterceptor

provide a transaction context for each request since the interceptor might be called multiple times for the same request (by e.g. using ) all previous transactions must be kept for releasing them later. For this a Stack is used.
